attributes.action: MAKE ARMED FORCES/WAR PENSIONS EXEMPT FROM DWP CALCULATIONS
attributes.additional_details:
All forms of armed forces/war pensions income should be exempt from calculations when you apply/need help from the DWP

Example £160 per week should be exempted

At present all income is taken into account for dwp purposes, but you are allowed the first £10 per week

We have served this country,so now help those who have served
